channel.title: Seil Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 10.9.4
item.description:
About v10.9.4 Update

  • v10.9.4: Fixed an issue: A message "Seil cannot connect with kernel extension" might be shown in some environment.
  • v10.9.3: Show an error alert when Seil is not placed in /Applications.
  • v10.9.2: Added a remappable key: space key.
  • v10.9.1: SteelSeries Apex Gaming Keyboard has been supported.
Seil web site
